# PortalComponent.ClippingMode

**Enumeration**

Specifies the mode of clipping for a portal.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ClippingMode
```

## Overview

This type can be passed into [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/clippingMode-swift.property] to configure the portal component’s clipping feature.

With [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/ClippingMode-swift.enum/disabled], contents in portal world are not clipped

With [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/ClippingMode-swift.enum/plane(_:)], contents within portal are clipped by the edge of the plane.

## Enumeration Cases

- **PortalComponent.ClippingMode.disabled**: Disables clipping of the contents within the portal.
- **PortalComponent.ClippingMode.plane(_:)**: Clips the contents within the portal by the edge of the plane.

## Conforms To

- Equatable

items.name: PortalComponent.ClippingMode.disabled

items.description: Clips the contents within the portal by the edge of the plane.
